com.avaya.ic.sdk
Interface User

public interface User

Represents the User associated with the Session. This interface contains mostly getters which you can use to get information about the User. User also contains the mechanism that allows an agent to change his or her IC password.

Method Summary

          Get The first name of the agent as configured in IC Manager.

isSupervisor

boolean isSupervisor()
Get True if this agent has a role of supervisor configured in IC Manager. Use this to display supervisor related GUI.

Returns:
True if this agent has a role of supervisor configured in IC Manager. Use this to display supervisor related GUI.

getSupervisorName

java.lang.String getSupervisorName()
Get The name of supervisor assigned to workgroup to which this agent belongs. P.S. If an agent is configured for more than one workgroup, SDK will pick up the supervisor name from the first configured workgroup of the agent.

Returns:
The name of supervisor assigned to workgroup to which this agent belongs. P.S. If an agent is configured for more than one workgroup, SDK will pick up the supervisor name from the first configured workgroup of the agent.
